reporter_caption.center: WHITLEY v. CREDITHRIFT OF AMERICA, INC., 259 Ga. 310 (1989)

caption.center: WHITLEY et al. v. CREDITHRIFT OF AMERICA, INC. et al.

opinion.opinion_text:
After plenary consideration of this matter, Credithrift ofAmerica v. Whitley, 190 Ga. App. 833 (380 S.E.2d 489) (1989), it is found not to satisfy the criteria for the grant of certiorari, and the writ is therefore vacated.
All the Justices concur, except Weltner, J., notparticipating.
DECIDED JUNE 23, 1989.
